ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] Patch Message
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Why bother trying to discuss class balance if you re not going to even look at the possibility that bards are overpowered already?  And if you won t accept
ygData.messageBody:
At 11:20 AM 2/21/01 -0500, you wrote:
>all I can say is (excuse my language) what a fucking joke. 10 points per
>level above level 45? Well damn, I do an extra 100 hp of damage with DDD,
>it's still a complete and utter waste of a spell slot. I'm really going to
>spend all my mana on 400 points of damage.
>
>I'm so disappointed it hurts. Why bother trying to "balance" the classes if
>you're going to fall so short.
>
>Draelon Stormsong

Why bother trying to discuss class balance if you're not going to even look at the possibility
that bards are overpowered already? And if you won't accept that if bards are currently overpowered
compared to other classes as a whole that they won't get major improvements while some other
classes will, then I predict you are about to be even more disappointed.
